div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
<!-- If you want show a specific post, you can also add in the Labl Section of your Post, take the Label : "Featured" and "Label" . Save the Post, you will see the Post in your Slideshow
See more at your install Video : -->
<script src="/feeds/posts/default/?orderby=published&alt=json-in-script&callback=autoslide&max-results=5"></script>
